trans-unit.source: Defines a reusable object that sends output to a printer, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un oggetto riutilizzabile che invia l'output a una stampante, durante la stampa da un'applicazione Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create an instance of the PrintDocument class, set properties such as the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A>and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>, and call the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method to start the printing process.
trans-unit.target: In genere, si crea un'istanza della classe PrintDocument, impostare proprietà quali il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>e chiamare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A>metodo per avviare il processo di stampa.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event where you specify the output to print, by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Gestire l' <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento in cui si specifica l'output da stampare, utilizzando la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>proprietà di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing from a Windows Form application, see the [Windows Forms Print Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla stampa da un'applicazione Windows Form, vedere il [il supporto di stampa di Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera stampare da un'applicazione Windows Presentation Foundation, vedere il <xref:System.Printing>dello spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes all fields based upon the default printer.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore predefinito inizializza tutti i campi in base alla stampante predefinita.

trans-unit.source: Typically, after creating a new <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, you set printer and page settings that affect the output through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: In genere, dopo aver creato un nuovo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, si imposta stampante e della pagina di impostazioni che influiscono sull'output tramite il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A>proprietà, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*> method is called and before the first page of the document prints.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*>metodo viene chiamato e prima della prima pagina di stampa il documento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you handle the BeginPrint event to initialize fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: In genere, l'evento BeginPrint per inizializzare i tipi di carattere, flussi di file e altre risorse utilizzate durante il processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>delegato all'evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi con i delegati, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets page settings that are used as defaults for all pages to be printed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le impostazioni della pagina vengono utilizzate come valori predefiniti per tutte le pagine da stampare.

trans-unit.source: You can specify several default page settings through the DefaultPageSettings property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile specificare diverse impostazioni di pagina predefinite tramite la proprietà DefaultPageSettings.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property specifies whether the page prints in color, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property specifies landscape or portrait orientation, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property specifies the margins of the page.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà specifica se la pagina di stampa a colori, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà specifica l'orientamento orizzontale o verticale e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà specifica i margini della pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify settings on a page-by-page basis, handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> event and modify the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageSettings%2A> argument included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Per specificare le impostazioni in base a una pagina per pagina, per gestire il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>eventi e modificare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageSettings%2A>argomento incluso nella <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageSettings%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After printing has started, changes to page settings through the DefaultPageSettings property will not affect pages being printed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Dopo la stampa è stato avviato, le modifiche alle impostazioni tramite la proprietà DefaultPageSettings non influiranno pagine da stampare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> that specifies the default page settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> che specifica le impostazioni predefinite per il documento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the document name to display (for example, in a print status dialog box or printer queue) while printing the document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del documento da visualizzare (ad esempio, in un stato della stampa finestra di dialogo o coda di stampa) durante la stampa del documento.

trans-unit.source: The DocumentName property does not specify the file to print.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà DocumentName non specifica il file da stampare.

trans-unit.source: Rather, you specify the output to print by handling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Invece possibile specificare l'output da stampare gestendo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Cenni preliminari sulla classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The document name to display while printing the document.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del documento da visualizzare durante la stampa del documento.

trans-unit.source: The default is "document".
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è "documento".

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the last page of the document has printed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando l'ultima pagina del documento è stato stampato.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you handle the EndPrint event to release fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process, like fonts.
trans-unit.target: In genere, l'evento EndPrint per rilasciare i tipi di carattere, flussi di file e altre risorse utilizzate durante il processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: You indicate that there are no more pages to print by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `false` in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Indicare che non sono presenti più pagine da stampare impostando il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `false` nel <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The EndPrint event also occurs if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: L'evento EndPrint si verifica anche se il processo di stampa è stato annullato o si verifica un'eccezione durante il processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>delegato all'evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi con i delegati, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is called after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*> method is called and before the first page of the document prints.
trans-unit.target: Viene chiamato dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*>metodo viene chiamato e prima della prima pagina di stampa il documento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*>

trans-unit.source: The OnBeginPrint method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnBeginPrint consente alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the OnBeginPrint method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando una classe derivata chiama il metodo OnBeginPrint, genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>evento richiamando il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is called when the last page of the document has printed.
trans-unit.target: Viene chiamato quando l'ultima pagina del documento è stato stampato.

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPrint method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnEndPrint consente alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPrint method is also called if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnEndPrint viene chiamato anche se il processo di stampa è stato annullato o si verifica un'eccezione durante il processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the OnEndPrint method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando una classe derivata chiama il metodo OnEndPrint, genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>evento richiamando il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is called before a page prints.
trans-unit.target: Viene chiamato prima di una pagina di stampa.

trans-unit.source: The OnPrintPage method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnPrintPage consente alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the OnPrintPage method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando una classe derivata chiama il metodo OnPrintPage, genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento richiamando il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is called immediately before each <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Viene chiamato immediatamente prima di ogni <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The OnQueryPageSettings method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnQueryPageSettings consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the OnQueryPageSettings method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando una classe derivata chiama il metodo OnQueryPageSettings, genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>evento richiamando il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the position of a graphics object associated with a page is located just inside the user-specified margins or at the top-left corner of the printable area of the page.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se la posizione di un oggetto graphics associata a una pagina si trova all'interno dei margini specificati dall'utente o nell'angolo superiore sinistro dell'area stampabile della pagina.

trans-unit.source: Calculating the area available to print requires knowing the physical size of the paper, the margins for the page, and the location of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object origin.
trans-unit.target: Il calcolo dell'area disponibile per la stampa è necessario conoscere le dimensioni fisiche della carta, i margini della pagina e il percorso del <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>dell'oggetto di origine.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: When OriginAtMargins is `true`, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object location takes into account the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value and the printable area of the page.
trans-unit.target: Quando OriginAtMargins è `true`, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>posizione dell'oggetto prende in considerazione il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valore della proprietà e l'area stampabile della pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: When OriginAtMargins is `false`, only the printable area of the page is used to determine the location of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object origin, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Quando OriginAtMargins è `false`, solo l'area stampabile della pagina viene utilizzato per determinare la posizione del <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>dell'oggetto di origine, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valore viene ignorato.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: For example, if OriginAtMargins is `true`, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set for 1 inch on each side, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> is located 1 inch from the left and top of the page.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se è OriginAtMargins `true`, e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è impostata su 1 pollice su ciascun lato, di <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto incluso nel <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>è disponibile 1 pollice dalla parte superiore della pagina sinistra.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the printable area of the page is .25 of an inch on each side and OriginAtMargins is `false`, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object is located .25 of an inch from the left and top of the page.
trans-unit.target: Se l'area stampabile della pagina è.25 di un pollice su ciascun lato e OriginAtMargins `false`, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto si trova.25 di un pollice dalla parte superiore della pagina sinistra.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The printable area of a page varies from printer to printer and is not guaranteed to be symmetrical.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Area stampabile della pagina varia da stampante a stampante e potrebbe non essere simmetrici.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the graphics origin starts at the page margins; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the graphics origin is at the top-left corner of the printable page.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'origine delle immagini inizia in corrispondenza i margini di pagina; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se l'origine delle immagini nell'angolo superiore sinistro della pagina stampabile.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Starts the document's printing process.
trans-unit.target: Avviato processo di stampa del documento.

trans-unit.source: Specify the output to print by handling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event and by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Specificare l'output da stampare mediante la gestione di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>eventi e l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>inclusi in <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify which printer should print the document.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per specificare la stampante deve stampare il documento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Print method prints the document without using a print dialog.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di stampa stampa il documento senza utilizzare una finestra di dialogo Stampa.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when you want to offer the user the ability to choose print settings.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>quando si desidera offrire all'utente la possibilità di scegliere le impostazioni di stampa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an exception that is not handled by the Print method is thrown during printing, the printing of the document is aborted.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se viene generata un'eccezione non gestita dal metodo di stampa durante la stampa, la stampa del documento viene interrotta.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: La stampante indicata nella <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> proprietà non esiste.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the print controller that guides the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il controller di stampa che guida il processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A print controller guides the printing process in several ways.
trans-unit.target: Un controller di stampa guida il processo di stampa in diversi modi.

trans-unit.source: For example, to print a document, you need to convert it to a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, per stampare un documento, è necessario convertirla in un <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> specifies where to draw the graphic in an image for a print preview or on a printer to actually print the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>Specifica la posizione in cui disegnare la grafica in un'immagine di anteprima di stampa o su una stampante per stampare il documento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>

trans-unit.source: A print controller can also specify whether to print a document immediately, or wait a specified interval.
trans-unit.target: Un controller di stampa può inoltre specificare se stampare un documento immediatamente o attendere un intervallo specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> that guides the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> che guida il processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: The default is a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer that prints the document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la stampante che stampa il documento.

trans-unit.source: You can specify several printer settings through the PrinterSettings property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile specificare diverse impostazioni della stampante tramite la proprietà PrinterSettings.

trans-unit.source: For example, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the number of copies you want to print, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the printer to use, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the range of pages you want to print.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, utilizzare la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per specificare il numero di copie da stampare, la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per specificare la stampante da utilizzare e la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per specificare l'intervallo di pagine da stampare.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> that specifies where and how the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> che specifica dove e come stampare il documento.

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> with its properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> con le proprietà impostate sui valori predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the output to print for the current page is needed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando è necessaria l'output da stampare per la pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: To specify the output to print, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Per specificare l'output da stampare, utilizzare la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A>proprietà di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify a line of text that should be printed, draw the text using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, per specificare una riga di testo che deve essere stampata, disegnare il testo utilizzando il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In addition to specifying the output, you can indicate if there are additional pages to print by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Oltre a specificare l'output, è possibile indicare se sono presenti altre pagine da stampare impostando il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`, which indicates that there are no more pages to print.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è `false`, che indica che non sono presenti più pagine da stampare.

trans-unit.source: Individual page settings can also be modified through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> and the print job can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile modificare le impostazioni della pagina singoli tramite il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>e può essere annullato il processo di stampa impostando la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: To print each page of a document using different page settings, handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> event.
trans-unit.target: Per stampare ogni pagina di un documento usando diverse impostazioni di pagina, gestire il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventHandler>delegato all'evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi con i delegati, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before each <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica immediatamente prima di ogni <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to print each page of a document using different page settings.
trans-unit.target: È possibile stampare ogni pagina di un documento usando diverse impostazioni di pagina.

trans-unit.source: You set page settings by modifying individual properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or by setting the property to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.
trans-unit.target: Per scegliere le impostazioni della pagina, modificare le singole proprietà del <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà o impostando la proprietà a un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> affect only the current page, not the document's default page settings.
trans-unit.target: Le modifiche apportate al <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>interessano solo la pagina corrente, non del documento impostazioni predefinite della pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: The print job can also be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` for the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Il processo di stampa può essere annullato anche impostando il <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>proprietà `true` per <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventHandler>delegato all'evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi con i delegati, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Provides information about the print document, in string form.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce informazioni sul documento di stampa, sotto forma di stringa.

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa.
